I am a Lecturer in the [Department of Pure and Applied Sciences](https://spas.kyu.ac.ke/spas-pages/departments/pure-and-applied-sciences) ,[School of Pure and Applied Sciences](https://spas.kyu.ac.ke/) at [Kirinyaga University](https://www.kyu.ac.ke/)

My Research and teaching focus on:

-   Statistical Modeling

-   Mathematical Statistics

-   Data Science

-   Machine Learning

-   Spatial Statistics

I am an author and maintainer of the following three R packages

-   [NovelDistns](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/NovelDistns/index.html)

-   [rKenyaForex](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/rKenyaForex/rKenyaForex.pdf)

-   [AHSurv](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/AHSurv/index.html)

Creator of the following Overleaf Latex Template [KyU Thesis Template](https://www.overleaf.com/project/66140ee1e75e7b96afd166bf)

I also provide statistical consultancies including statistical and methodological services at an affordable fee.
